# TextureResource.MipmapsMode.allocateAll

**Case**

Allocate memory for all mipmaps, but don’t generate them.

## Declaration

```swift
case allocateAll
```

## Specifying allocation and generation

- **TextureResource.MipmapsMode.none**: Do not allocate mipmaps for the texture resource.
- **TextureResource.MipmapsMode.allocateAndGenerateAll**: Allocate and generate all mipmaps for the texture resource.

items.description: Do not allocate mipmaps for the texture resource.
items.name: TextureResource.MipmapsMode.none

items.description: Allocate and generate all mipmaps for the texture resource.
